hide31=yes}}: Mabel]], two household servants, and the nurse holding [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column4: Ronald]] pose for a picture in the garden at Bank House. The photograph is used in Tolkien Christmas cards sent to family and friends. The image is reproduced in ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography]]'' and ''[[The Tolkien Family Album]]''.
